message: This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product worth $1200000. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, a 16.7% discount. If you don't buy, I'll be left with a $200000 loss. I'm only offering this deal because I value our potential long-term relationship. Please consider this a one-time offer.
I appreciate the unique opportunity and the value of our potential long-term relationship. I am willing to make this purchase at the discounted rate you've offered.

I'm hoping you can help me clear out my inventory and make room for more high-quality products.
